review: This has worked great for my family, and unexpectedly my favorite feature is the free photo storage on prime that displays all of my pictures for me while I listen to Pandora or just as a screen saver. I even had an issue with the first remote I bought and Amazon rectified that for me by sending a replacement. My only complaint is that Amazon won't let me stream my Google play movies. Google has the right to sell the new Annie movie and many others that Amazon does not sell, and there is no way to stream that to my TV with this device, which is very disappointing.
